title: Rider transfer ticker: EF-Cannondale adds two more, Gibbons to Lidl-Trek, Astana signs Fortunato
content:
Follow all the main moves of the 2023 'transfer window' for the men's and women's pelotons.

Read the full article at Rider transfer ticker: EF-Cannondale adds two more, Gibbons to Lidl-Trek, Astana signs Fortunato on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
